docs.title: 📚 GhostMicro Library Documents
docs.text: Welcome to the centralized documentation hub for GhostMicro Libraries. This repository hosts technical manuals, API references, and integration guides for the GhostMicro ecosystem.

docs.title: For Developers
docs.text:
Connect your project to the GhostMicro ecosystem using our standardized libraries.

# Example: Install GhostMicro Core via Arduino Library Manager
ghost-install core

docs.title: 📖 Categories
docs.text:
• Core System: Kernel / Reflex / Soul communication standards.
  • Sensors: Drivers for verified sensors (BME280, Ultrasonic, etc.).
  • Actuators: Motor control, Servos, and Relays.
  • Displays: HUD and Dashboard protocols.

Maintained by GhostMicro Team
